title: [DB-level DR stream] [YSQL] Incorrect Error Message When Creating Non-Existent Index/Table/Partitions in Replication Setup
body:
Jira Link: [DB-10486](https://yugabyte.atlassian.net/browse/DB-10486)
### Description

After setting up replication, if a client tries to create an index, table, or partitions that are not present at the source, it results in an incorrect error message.
The system throws the following error message:
`ERROR:  Database not found: db2`

This error message is misleading as it does not accurately represent the issue at hand.
### Steps to Reproduce
```
## ON Source
create database db2;
\c db2

CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "uuid-ossp";

CREATE TYPE complex AS (re float8, im float8);

CREATE TYPE e_details AS ENUM ('Email', 'Sms', 'Phone');

CREATE DOMAIN postal_code AS TEXT CHECK(VALUE ~ '^\d{5}$'OR VALUE ~ '^\d{5}-\d{4}$');

CREATE TABLE tab_1 (id TEXT, uuid_col uuid DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(), name text COLLATE "en_US.utf8", c complex, info json, contact JSONB, arr smallint[], cash money, i inet, m macaddr, i2 serial, i3 bigserial, val smallint, details e_details, age int, collated_data text collate "POSIX",date DATE, n NUMERIC (3, 2),r real, c1 CHAR(1), created_at timestamptz, uuid0 uuid DEFAULT uuid_nil(), uuid1 uuid DEFAULT uuid_generate_v1(), p1 POINT,t1 TIME,ts1 TIMESTAMP,i4 INTERVAL,p2 path, p3 polygon,b box, c2 circle, l line, l1 lseg, a2 text[][], zip postal_code, PRIMARY KEY (id HASH, name, uuid_col));

DO
$do$
BEGIN 
   FOR i IN 1..5000 LOOP
   INSERT INTO tab_1(id, name, c, info, contact, arr, cash, m, i3,details,age,collated_data, date,n,r,c1,created_at,p1,t1,ts1,i4,p2,p3,c2,l,l1,a2,zip) VALUES (i, 'Shubham Agrawal', (1,2), '{"customer": "John Doe", "items": {"product": "Laptop","qty": 6}}','{"phones":[ {"type": "mobile", "phone": "001001"}, {"type": "fix", "phone": "002002"}]}', '{1, 2, 3}', '$99.99' ,'00:00:00:00:00:00',i+1,'Sms',15, md5(random()::text), current_timestamp,5.36,2147483647,'G',now(), point(3, 4),LOCALTIME(0), current_timestamp(0),  '00:25:00', '(1,3), (4,12)','(1,3),(4,12), (2,4)','10, 4, 10','{1,2,3}','(0, 4), (2,8)','{{"b1", "c"}, {"m1", "l"}}',89000);
   END LOOP;
END
$do$;
./bin/yb-admin --master_addresses 172.151.20.7:7100,172.151.42.86:7100,172.151.50.175:7100 create_xcluster_checkpoint rg2 db2
./bin/yb-admin -master_addresses 172.151.20.7:7100,172.151.42.86:7100,172.151.50.175:7100  setup_xcluster_replication rg2 172.151.19.114:7100,172.151.45.76:7100,172.151.59.238:7100

xCluster Replication group rg2 setup successfully

DO
$do$
BEGIN 
   FOR i IN 1..5000 LOOP
   INSERT INTO tab_1(id, name, c, info, contact, arr, cash, m, i3,details,age,collated_data, date,n,r,c1,created_at,p1,t1,ts1,i4,p2,p3,c2,l,l1,a2,zip) VALUES (i, 'Shubham Agrawal', (1,2), '{"customer": "John Doe", "items": {"product": "Laptop","qty": 6}}','{"phones":[ {"type": "mobile", "phone": "001001"}, {"type": "fix", "phone": "002002"}]}', '{1, 2, 3}', '$99.99' ,'00:00:00:00:00:00',i+1,'Sms',15, md5(random()::text), current_timestamp,5.36,2147483647,'G',now(), point(3, 4),LOCALTIME(0), current_timestamp(0),  '00:25:00', '(1,3), (4,12)','(1,3),(4,12), (2,4)','10, 4, 10','{1,2,3}','(0, 4), (2,8)','{{"b1", "c"}, {"m1", "l"}}',89000);
   END LOOP;
END
$do$;

## ON TARGET connect to ysqlsh db

db2=#  CREATE INDEX idx_tab_1_age ON tab_1 (age) WHERE age > 18;
ERROR:  Database not found: db2
```
[Target master logs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cG6f7XqkGl45VwYw82p5Yfa0FNlkUhgs/view?usp=drive_link)



### Issue Type

kind/bug

### Warning: Please confirm that this issue does not contain any sensitive information

- [X] I confirm this issue does not contain any sensitive information.
